contract_details.description: Comprehensive performance optimization focusing on resource cleanup, memory management, and efficiency improvements. Identify and eliminate performance bottlenecks while maintaining functionality.
contract_details.background: Agent-1 specializes in system integration and core optimization. This contract leverages that expertise to systematically improve performance through targeted cleanup and optimization efforts.
objectives: Audit all Python files for performance bottlenecks
Implement lazy loading for heavy imports and resources
Optimize memory usage in data processing operations
Eliminate redundant computations and caching layers
Improve database query performance and connection pooling
Optimize file I/O operations and reduce disk access
Implement proper resource cleanup and garbage collection
Validate no functionality regressions from optimizations
deliverables: Performance audit report with identified bottlenecks
Optimized code with improved performance metrics
Resource cleanup implementation with proper disposal
Performance monitoring system with real-time metrics
Benchmarking suite for ongoing performance tracking
Optimization validation report confirming no regressions
success_criteria: Zero memory leaks or resource leaks

network_unlocks: Access to Performance Optimization Working Group

contract_history.details: Created performance optimization cleanup contract for Agent-1
Agent-1 claimed performance optimization contract and began mission
